title: List of all Android checkbox  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android checkbox  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: CompoundLayout
repoList.description: It's an Android library that allows you to use Layout as RadioButton or CheckBox.

repoList.name: CheckBoxGroup
repoList.description: Android library for handling multiple checkbox

repoList.name: CompoundButtonGroup
repoList.description: An Android library to easily implement compound buttons

repoList.name: ButtonCheckBox
repoList.description: ButtonCheckBox is tiny Android library to have CheckBox Like Button

repoList.name: MaterialChecklist
repoList.description: The flexible, easy to use checklist library written in Kotlin for your Android projects.

repoList.name: ProgressiveCheckboxForm
repoList.description: Android library to progressive checkbox form

repoList.name: PrintArray
repoList.description: Alert Dialog Box library to create checkboxes or RadioGroup with a list of array in one line

Google Places API   Welcome to Retrofit Android Example Tutorial. Today we’ll use the Retrofit library developed by Square to handle REST API calls in our android application.  Table of Contents [ hide ]  1 Retrofit Android 2 OkHttp Interceptors 3 Setting Up the Retrofit Interface 4 Retrofit Android Example Project Structure Retrofit Android Retrofit is type-safe REST client for Android and Java which aims to make it easier to consume RESTful web services.
